title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Binance names cofounder Yi He as new co-CEO
items.description: Yi He has worked in crypto since the early days of the industry, and becomes one of only a handful of women to lead a crypto firm.
